title: Candy Crush Soda Saga 1.82.9 APK #Casual #Games
text:
Downloads 
3.1 M Candy Crush Soda Saga is a new game in the Candy Crush franchise that allows you to enjoy the same mechanics that you are already familiar with but with some interesting new twists that will breathe more life into the Candy universe. As is common with the King.com games, players can play on their own without needing to connect with their friends. However, challenging your Facebook friends and sharing your achievements with them will bring you certain benefits that you will eventually need if you want to keep progressing. The first version of Candy Crush Soda Saga has 75 different levels where you have to match candies, gummies, and other sweets in order to make them disappear from the board. The goal, as always, is to get three stars on each level, which will allow you to get all kinds of gifts. Visually speaking, Candy Crush Soda Saga has the same esthetics that made Candy Crush Saga so famous. In other words, it has simple, lovely, very colorful designs that will enchant both kids and adults. Candy Crush Soda Saga is an entertaining game. Though it doesn't offer many challenges, it does suck its users in thanks to its simple, easy-to-learn mechanics. Requirements 
Requires Android 2.2 or later. Opinions about Candy Crush Soda Saga 5.0
